data.name: Kathy Rain Demo
data.detailed_description:
Kathy Rain tells the compelling story of a strong-willed college girl with a knack for detective work (and a Harley) who returns to her hometown after being gone since childhood. Set in the 90’s, Kathy starts investigating a local mystery and the legacy of her recently deceased grandfather.

As she follows a trail of clues he left behind, questions emerge… What was Joseph Rain really looking for that night all those years ago? What turned him into a mere shell of a man, confined to a wheelchair? What secret did a suicidal young artist take with her to the grave, and why are so many people in Conwell Springs going mad? The truth is dark and sinister…

  • 320x240 (4:3) resolution with crisp pixel art graphics
  • 4,000+ lines of dialogue
  • Full English voice acting directed by Wadjet Eye Games' Dave Gilbert
  • Original soundtrack
  • 40+ hand-drawn environments
  • Compelling narrative with eerie plot set in the 90's

data.short_description: Kathy Rain tells the compelling story of a strong-willed college girl with a knack for detective work (and a Harley) who returns to her hometown after being gone since childhood. Set in the 90’s, Kathy starts investigating a local mystery and the legacy of her recently deceased grandfather.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Polish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 300 MHz Processor
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 320 x 240 32 bit
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Video: DirectX & Directdraw Supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1 gigahertz (GHz) or faster 32-bit (x86) or 64-bit (x64) processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 graphics device with WDDM 1.0 or higher driver
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Snow Leopard (version 10.6)
  • Processor: Intel processor (Dual Core)
  • Graphics: Nvidia 320m (or equivalent)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X El Capitan (version 10.11)
  • Processor: Intel processor i5
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9400M, GeForce 9600M GT, GeForce 8600M GT, GeForce GT 120, GeForce GT 130, GeForce GTX 285, GeForce 8800 GT, GeForce 8800 GS, Quadro FX 4800, Quadro FX5600 ATI Radeon 4850, Radeon 4870
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
